snippet: Second-seeded Richard Gasquet reached his first semifinal of the season with a 7-6 (1), 6-2 win over Daniel Muñoz de la Nava at the Estoril Open in Oeiras, Portugal.
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Richard Gasquet reached his first semifinal of the season with a 7-6 (1), 6-2 win over Daniel Muñoz de la Nava at the Estoril Open in Oeiras, Portugal.
